column4: I still cant unlock my screen... changing my password doesnt work, mv'ing .Xauthority (as suggested on the forum) doesnt work, my permissions for the shadow and gshadow-stuff is correct... Logging in via tty1 works perfect, Trying to unlock gives Incorrect password, even though the password is 100% correct... I cant reboot because I have some important files open...
could you not SSH in and close down th eopen files
its graphical interfaces that have the files open... i can login via tty (ctrl-alt-f1), but that wont really help me with saving the files :(
could you add another user and login with that
